# Photo Sphere Viewer / Video Plugin

[![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@photo-sphere-viewer/video-plugin?color=f86036&label=npm&logo=npm)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@photo-sphere-viewer/video-plugin)
